_aChangeLog.text: Adjusted ZR config: fewer mother zombies, zombies now have slightly less health
Reduced speed of boss lifesteal push
Zombies don't teleport as quickly after each hold point
Changed indoor soundscape to something with less echo
Optional override config: put your override settings in sunlight_override.cfg

_sText:
UPDATE 11-NOV-2014: v2_0 released.

---

ze_sunlight by Soft Serve

This is my first fully complete ZE map. I took a lot of inspiration from Zelda and Dark Souls dungeon design, as well as the general atmosphere of Shadow of the Colossus. I hope you enjoy.

Features:

- 5 stages, all with different routes and endings
- 4 special weapons
- 1 boss fight
- Music
- Admin room for changing stages

---

Changelog:

v2_0
- Adjusted ZR config: fewer mother zombies, zombies now have slightly less health
- Changed skybox
- Added/changed some hold points
- Boosted boss health slightly
- Reduced speed of boss lifesteal push
- Reduced boss lifesteal amount
- Boosted melon/orange launcher damage slightly
- Zombies don't teleport as quickly after each hold point
- Changed indoor soundscape to something with less echo
- Optional override config: put your override settings in sunlight_override.cfg
- Various minor changes

v1_0
- Fixed boss and dragon health scaling
- Nerfed all special weapons
- Added 3D skybox
- Added ZR config file
- Fixed stage 2 nuke glitch
- Boosted music volume
- Various minor changes

v0_1
- Beta release
